column4: hello we have domain sfw.local and loca dns server. The client is ubuntu. If we put www.sfw.local in firefox it makes query to MDNS 244.0.0.1 instead of our local DNS (which authorative for sfw.local). Why?
look in your network manager config to see what dns servers ubuntu is setup to use
first - our local DNS, second - ISP's DNS
ok - so it should only query those two servers
